description:
Countdown HD is a countdown timer designed to be easy and fast to use.
This is a great tool for those that need to hold speeches and presentations or for those that need to make sure they stay in a very well defined time interval.


-- Features --
        - Increase or decrease time by sliding on the screen
        with your fingers
        - Choose from a list of 10 predefined time presets
        - Alarm rings at the end of the countdown

-- Contact
        E-mail:   support@adrianmobdev.com
        Twitter: @adrianmpn

Note: because of technical limitations the countdown will not work if the app is not in the foreground or if the TouchPad is turned off.
